name: Bridge Trolls
description:
Bridge Trolls is a play-and-earn game on the Avalanche Blockchain network.

An epic bridge battle between Trolls and Apes.

Three Apes have attempted to cross the bridge without paying the toll.

Your role is to make them pay. You must defeat the apes in an epic battle.

Trolls who win the battle are rewarded with unique NFTs.

If you are defeated, don't despair.

You have a chance to break free from prison and earn an NFT.

Finally, hidden within the game is an easter egg. Find it and you'll be singing from the rooftops!

To be eligible for rewards you must hold a Bridge Troll in your wallet.\

You can collect a Troll here: https://app.nftrade.com/assets/avalanche/0xa7b256fd635c42887432bd4070baa4384f1ab...
